tech_news.title: Analogue3D Review - IGN
tech_news.description: The Analogue3D is the best way to play N64 games on a modern display.

tech_news.title: Microsoft is turning Windows into an ‘agentic OS,’ starting with the taskbar - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is adding AI agents to the Windows 11 taskbar. It’s all part of a broader push to transform Windows into an “agentic OS.”

tech_news.title: The 30 best Christmas gifts for gamers and movie lovers - The Verge
tech_news.description: The holidays are almost here. Luckily, we’ve curated a collection of great entertainment gifts for gamers, movie lovers, board game enthusiasts, and would-be DMs.

tech_news.title: Guild Wars Reforged announced for PC - Gematsu
tech_news.description: ArenaNet and co-developer 2weeks have announced Guild Wars Reforged for PC. It will launch via Steam and direct download from ArenaNet on December 3 for $19.99.

tech_news.title: Mapping the future with 3D-printed titanium Apple Watch cases - Apple
tech_news.description: Apple Watch Ultra 3 and titanium Apple Watch Series 11 cases are now 3D-printed with 100 percent recycled aerospace-grade titanium powder.

tech_news.title: Coming to Xbox Game Pass: Fortnite Crew, The Crew Motorfest, Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault, and More - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Coming soon to Game Pass: Fortnite Crew, The Crew Motorfest, Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault, and more!

tech_news.title: Sony is taking $100 off its PS5 consoles for Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: Sony is cutting the prices of its PS5 consoles, accessories, and games for Black Friday. PS5 consoles are temporarily dropping by $100.

tech_news.title: In the wake of Battlefield 6 and Arc Radiers, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 suffered a much smaller launch than previous CoD games - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Activision's own response to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's release seems more muted than previous years.

tech_news.title: Steam Machine and Steam Frame: your questions answered - The Verge
tech_news.description: Here’s our FAQ on Valve’s new hardware lineup, including the Steam Machine console, the Steam Frame headset, and the Steam Controller.

tech_news.title: Has Samsung Installed ‘Unremovable Israeli Spyware’ On Your Phone? - Forbes
tech_news.description: Samsung responds to accusations it has embedded AppCloud "spyware" on hundreds of millions of Galaxy phones.
